message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $10800. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings of $1200 compared to the standard price. I look forward to hearing your response and potentially discussing any further details you might need. Thank you for considering our product.
